gw.api.bean.compare

Class MatcherContext

  • gw.api.bean.compare.MatcherContext

  • public class MatcherContext
    The context of an entity matching (EntityMatcher ).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityMatcher<KeyableBean> findMatcher(IEntityType beanType)
      Returns the specific matcher for the given bean type, or any supertype of the bean type.
      EntityMatcher<T> getSpecificMatcher(T bean)
      Returns the matcher for the specific bean.

    • Method Detail

      • findMatcher

        EntityMatcher<KeyableBean> findMatcher(IEntityType beanType)
        Returns the specific matcher for the given bean type, or any supertype of the bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanType - The type of the bean to return a matcher for
        Returns:
        The entity matcher if one found, else null

      • getSpecificMatcher

        EntityMatcher<T> getSpecificMatcher(T bean)
        Returns the matcher for the specific bean.
        Parameters:
        bean - The bean to return a matcher for
        Returns:
        The entity matcher, or null if none configured for that type
